Key Match Events: Croatian fans reportedly joined Albanian fans in chanting “Kill the Serbs” — in Croatian — in the Croatia-Albania game.
Post-Match Reflections: Albania's striker Mirlind Daku apologised on social media for leading fans in chanting anti-Macedonian slogans.
Miscellaneous Highlights: UEFA appointed an in-house investigator to study Mirlind Daku’s “alleged inappropriate behaviour”.
Others: Serbia had previously threatened to leave Euro 2024 if UEFA didn't take action.
Football federations are responsible for their fans' behaviour at games.
